snippet: David Liu used to travel very cheaply, which could involve several layovers. Then a backer told him that no chief executive could afford to be an exhausted traveler.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features XO Group co-founder and chief executive David Liu discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: David Liu used to travel very cheaply, which could involve several layovers. Then a backer told him that no chief executive could afford to be an exhausted traveler.

headline.seo: How a CEO Came to Know First Class - Frequent Flier
headline.main: How a C.E.O. Came to Like First Class
headline.print_headline: How a C.E.O. Came to Like First Class
